alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:06PM EDT until August 12 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 506 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ashford to Cottonwood to 6 miles northeast of Graceville to Slocomb, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Graceville, Marianna, Malone, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Esto, Campbellton, Noma, Bascom, Richter Crossroads, Tendil Crossing, Blue Spring, Union City, Lovedale, Dellwood, Star, Hornsville and Cobb Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
